event.event-label: GraphLM Asset Topology Plugin Event : Create Asset Topology File
event.descr: Create Topology File '%parm[topologyFilename]%' (if file undefined 'AssetTopologyFile.xml' is default )
event.logmsg: Create Topology File '%parm[topologyFilename]%' (if file undefined 'AssetTopologyFile.xml' is default )

event.event-label: GraphLM Asset Topology Plugin Event : Uninstall Asset Topology
event.descr: Uninstall Topology Name '%parm[topologyName]%' (if name undefined 'assetTopology' is default )
event.logmsg: Uninstall Topology Name '%parm[topologyName]%' (if name undefined 'assetTopology' is default )

event.event-label: GraphLM Asset Topology Plugin Event : Install Asset Topology
event.descr:
Install Topology Name '%parm[topologyName]%' (if name undefined 'assetTopology' is default )

Using Topology File '%parm[topologyFilename]%' (if undefined 'AssetTopologyFile.xml' is default )
event.logmsg: Install Topology Name '%parm[topologyName]%' (if name undefined 'assetTopology' is default )
